Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: It seems like people in Australia are actively engaged in social media to voice their opinions on essential issues within their country. From the government's funding for homeless shelters and Indigenous health centers to concerns over biosecurity it's clear that policies and initiatives by policymakers are receiving both criticism and support from the masses. On the one hand there are calls for the right balance between cost of living relief and inflation. While on the other hand many argue that funding for cancer smoking and vaping amongst First Nations communities should be prioritized. In addition increased assistance for those on JobSeeker is being championed while the Labor party is highlighting their initiatives to strengthen Medicare.
